description: Tendering Procedure: Selective Tendering. Description of Requirement: Retain the services of a Contractor for the provision of licensed security guards for Winterlude 2024. Basis of Selection \u2013 Lowest Cost Responsive Bid.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Title ( English and French)
**English:** Winterlude 2024 Security Coverage for Jacques-Cartier Park North
**Français:** Bal de Neige 2024 - Besoin en Sécurité pour le Domaine des Flocons - Parc Jacques-Cartier Nord

### Reference Number and Amendment Number
**Reference Number:** 10232271
**Amendment Number:** 3

### Tender Details
- **Publication Date:** 2023-12-01
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-12-14T14:00:00
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-18
- **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-15
- **Contract Status:** Expired

### Procurement Information
- **Notice Type:** Tender Notice
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive Selective Tendering
- **Trade Agreements:** None
- **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
- **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contracting Entity
- **Name:** Department of Canadian Heritage
- **Address:** 15 Eddy Street, 9th floor, Gatineau, QC K1A 0M5, Canada

### Tender Description (English)
The objective of this tender is to retain the services of a contractor to provide licensed security guards for Winterlude 2024. The services will be required at Jacques-Cartier North Park, located in Gatineau, QC.

### Tender Description (Français)
L'objectif de cet appel d'offres est de retenir les services d'un entrepreneur pour la fourniture de gardiens de sécurité pour le Bal de neige 2024. Les services sont nécessaires au parc Jacques-Cartier Nord, situé à Gatineau, QC.

### Administrative Information
- **Contact Person:** Stéphanie Dupel
- **Email Address:** contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca

### Security Requirements
None.
